name: Detoxifying Emotional Attachments
description: Purging toxic emotional bonds and replacing them with self-sustaining emotional resilience.

cards.title: Identifying Emotional Hooks
cards.description: Recognizing the emotional triggers that keep you psychologically entangled with a PSN.
bulletpoints: Analyzing patterns of guilt, obligation, and manufactured dependency.
Detecting and dismantling implanted fear narratives that prevent separation.
Recognizing where emotional loyalty has been weaponized against you.

cards.title: Emotional Decontamination Rituals
cards.description: Methods for emotionally purging PSN influence from the subconscious.
bulletpoints: Using guided visualization to detach lingering emotional residues.
Practicing emotional transmutation techniques to convert past pain into personal strength.
Employing structured grieving to process loss without reattachment.

cards.title: Rebuilding Self-Identity After Emotional Hijacking
cards.description: Restoring your authentic self after prolonged exposure to a PSN.
bulletpoints: Reconstructing a personal narrative independent of PSN influence.
Strengthening self-concept through affirmations and self-directed beliefs.
Practicing ego reinforcement exercises to eliminate past self-doubt.
